mng: to force (sb to do sth), to compel, to press for, to extort, to press on towards, to press up to, to close in on, used in the place of 屄[bi1], cunt
variant of 逼[bi1], to compel, to pressure

exm.mng: lifelike, true to life, distinctly, clearly
to threaten, to coerce, to intimidate
to force, to compel, to coerce
to press on towards, to close in on, to approach, to draw near
to question intensely, to interrogate, to demand information
to press hard, to close in on
